#summary The list-style property is a shorthand notation for setting 'list-style-type', 'list-style-image', and 'list-style-position'.
#labels about-css,is-css-property,from-w3c

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `[ 'list-style-type' || 'list-style-position' || 'list-style-image' ]`
  * `inherit`
